column5: Just wondering if anyone has had any luck fishing for walleyes on Lac Seul or elsewhere with Reef Runner Deep Diving Lures 800 series?
I haven't fished that far North since I was a boy. Down here in the Ozarks the Reef Runners work very well on Bull Shoals and Table Rock.
can't go wrong with any of the reef runners. They work excellent on Erie for the eyes.We use all sizes and they have some outstanding colors to.
All of the water that I fish in Canada are too shallow for the deep version but i use the shallow ones and like them very much.Good fishing Pikeman.
